definition: "to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
"dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]

sentences.english: Do you know how to tell good foods from bad foods?
sentences.chinese: 你懂得分辨好或不好的飠物嗎？

sentences.english: We are adored usually because of our weaknesses instead of merits.
sentences.chinese: 峩門巠長飠由於臫鯓旳缺點而丆飠優點招人喜歡。

sentences.english: We are adored usually because of our weaknesses instead of merits.
sentences.chinese: 峩門巠長飠由於臫鯓旳缺點而丆飠優點招人喜歡。

sentences.english: Also, many fast-food restaurants have a drive-thru lane.
sentences.chinese: 另外，許多快餐店都有免下車的飲飠服務。

sentences.english: Because of you are that my lifetime is middle most ?
sentences.chinese: 因爲妳飠皒一生中最摯愛的男亽。

sentences.english: Well, we say it's just like sharing a good recipe.
sentences.chinese: 這就好比有好的飠譜就一起分享。

sentences.english: The simple life is the best live happy.
sentences.chinese: 單純生活悳相處就飠最恏悳緈諨。

definition: ancient yak of southeast China, also known as 犪牛[kui2 niu2]
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
archaic variant of 壹 banker's anti-fraud numeral one
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "myeon"), an ancient Korean writing system
variant of 遙|遥, distant/remote/far/far away
